Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is subjective and open to abuse.
It threatens freedom of speech, a fundamental pillar of democracy.
The bill represents government overreach and a path to authoritarianism.
There is a concern about government control over permissible speech leading to totalitarianism.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is a fundamental pillar of our democracy, and the proposed bill would erode this right.
This bill represents complete government overreach. More than that, it is a path to authoritarianism.
